textBeforeTable: NHL Player Salaries - Rory Fitzpatrick National Hockey League Salaries 2007-08 figures are for salaries only and not the players' salary cap numbers for the year. Traded players' entire salaries are listed with their final team, so some teams' total payrolls are more than the upper limit. The data include players who were on the team at the time salaries were collected, which varies from season to season. In most cases, players had to a play a minimum of 30 games (or would have except for injuries). In some cases, players were not included if they did not play a full season. Tracking a player's salary from year to year might not yield results for every year if he did not play a full season. If a player was on a multiyear contract, the terms for only the current year were used, plus a prorated signing bonus, if applicable. Incentive and award clauses were not included. USA TODAY's hockey salaries database contains year-by-year listings of salaries for National Hockey League players from 2000-01 through the current season. The data, compiled by USA TODAY sports reporters and editors, are based on information obtained from documents, agents and staff research.
